attributes.action: All M.P.s and prospective M.P.s should be put on a lie detector when seeking election
attributes.additional_details:
When an election is held all candidates go on a lie detector and questions asked of them to see if they are lying or not.

At the very least the leaders of all political parties seeking office should at the same time go on a lie detector and be asked by their opponents questions so we can see if they are lying or not.
